channel.title: Xbox live is death
channel.description: hey everybody I've got some bad news for people who have an xbox, Xbox Live is Down for everyone sins few hours ago that contain some people blessing that they were attacked by hackers but I'm not sure if it's true. xbox is back maby in 2 days: ( :eek:

item.title: Xbox live is death
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

marcbob:

Everyone was claiming it was anonymous on twitter but all the “anonymous twitters” were saying they had nothing to do with it.

Microsoft is to full of themselves to allow such news get out unless it was true, and anonymous would be bragging about it left and right if it did happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox live is death
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:15, topic:515950”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=634205.msg4282957#msg4282957 date=1365959818]

whats with all the hackers lately

It wasn’t a hacker, it was a glitchy software update.

I’m not doubting you, but where did you hear about this? I’d like to read more about it.
[/quote]
My friend emma said she found out from their twitter so go check their twitter.[/quote]
I know for a fact Xbox would not release anything about being hacked unless it compromised accounts, or if it was longer then a day

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: Xbox live is death
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

The login server was down, some people could connect but most couldn’t. If you were already logged on it didn’t affect you.
It’s back on now, the new software they implemented is glitchy atm so things like inviting people to a party might not work the way it is intended to work like.

Read full topic
